actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the standard deduction from 15 percent to 20 percent, and to increase the maximum allowable amount of each deduction from $2,000 to $2,500.

summary.text: Increases the standard deduction allowed under the Internal Revenue Code from 15 percent to 20 percent, and increases the maximum allowable amount of such deduction from $2,000 to $2,500.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the standard deduction from 15 percent to 20 percent, and to increase the maximum allowable amount of each deduction from $2,000 to $2,500.
